recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of salmon fillets| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of honey| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of lime juice| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of soy sauce| Measurement; 15; Measure out 15 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of salt| Measurement; 1; Measure out 1 gram of black pepper| Untimed; None; Preheat oven to 200 degrees C (400 degrees F)| Untimed; None; In a bowl, whisk together honey, lime juice, soy sauce, olive oil, garlic, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Place salmon fillets in a baking dish| Untimed; None; Pour the honey-lime mixture over the salmon| Timed; 900; Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Honey Lime Salmon
